On this page

Collapse 折叠面板 ​

用于折叠和展开内容区域。

基础用法 ​

使用 v-model 绑定当前激活的面板。

Title Aheadline title

headline title

this is content a aaa
Title B
this is bbbbb test
Title C
this is cccc test

<template>
    <Collapse v-model="openedValue">
      <CollapseItem name="a" title="Title Aheadline title">
        <h1>headline title</h1>
        <div>this is content a aaa</div>
      </CollapseItem>
      <CollapseItem name="b" title="Title B">
        <div>this is bbbbb test</div>
      </CollapseItem>
      <CollapseItem name="c" title="Title C">
        <div>this is cccc test</div>
      </CollapseItem>
    </Collapse>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { Collapse } from 'asd-components';
import { CollapseItem } from 'asd-components';

const openedValue = ref<string[]>(['a']);
</script>

手风琴模式 ​

通过设置 accordion 属性可以让面板互斥展开。

Title A

headline title

this is content a aaa
Title B
this is bbbbb test
Title C
this is cccc test

<template>
  <Collapse v-model="openedValue" accordion>
    <CollapseItem name="a" title="Title A">
      <h1>headline title</h1>
      <div>this is content a aaa</div>
    </CollapseItem>
    <CollapseItem name="b" title="Title B">
      <div>this is bbbbb test</div>
    </CollapseItem>
    <CollapseItem name="c" title="Title C">
      <div>this is cccc test</div>
    </CollapseItem>
  </Collapse>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { Collapse } from 'asd-components';
import { CollapseItem } from 'asd-components';

const openedValue = ref<string[]>(['b']);
</script>

自定义面板标题 ​

除了可以直接使用title属性之外，也可以通过具名slot来实现自定义面板的标题内容

自定义title  

headline title

this is content a aaa
Title B
this is bbbbb test
Title C
this is cccc test

<template>
  <Collapse v-model="openedValue">
    <CollapseItem name="a" >
      <template #title>
          自定义title
          &nbsp;
          <Icon icon="fa-house" circle />
        </template>

      <h1>headline title</h1>
      <div>this is content a aaa</div>
    </CollapseItem>
    <CollapseItem name="b" title="Title B">
      <div>this is bbbbb test</div>
    </CollapseItem>
    <CollapseItem name="c" title="Title C">
      <div>this is cccc test</div>
    </CollapseItem>
  </Collapse>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { Collapse } from 'asd-components';
import { CollapseItem } from 'asd-components';
import { Icon } from 'asd-components';

const openedValue = ref<string[]>(['c']);
</script>

Collapse API ​

Collapse Attributes ​

属性名描述类型默认值
model-value / v-model当前激活的面板string[] | number[]—
accordion是否手风琴模式booleanfalse

Collapse Slots ​

插槽名说明
default自定义默认插槽内容

Collapse Item API ​

Collapse Item Attributes ​

属性名描述类型默认值
name面板唯一标识string | number—
title面板标题string—
disabled是否禁用booleanfalse

Collapse Item Slot ​

插槽名说明
default面板内容插槽
title自定义面板标题插槽
Pager
Previous pageButton 按钮
Next pageDropdown 下拉菜单
